system.descriptionText: Explorer's Strength and Size become that of the Battlesuit, and Pilot gains Auto-Stabilised Trait. If this system is disabled, Pilot cannot perform movement actions in addition to losing other benefits (size remains the same). Auto-Stabilised: No need to brace Heavy Weapons.

description.value: Explorer's Strength and Size become that of the Battlesuit, and Pilot gains Auto-Stabilised Trait. If this system is disabled, Pilot cannot perform movement actions in addition to losing other benefits (size remains the same). Auto-Stabilised: No need to brace Heavy Weapons.
